answer-a-few-questions-to-find-out-if-yo: Answer a few questions to find out if you can file your claim now.
answer-yes-if-you-traveled-from-the-addr: Answer 'Yes' if you traveled from the address listed here and you certify that it's not a Post Office Box.
are-you-claiming-only-mileage-and-no-oth: Are you claiming only mileage and no other expenses today?
check-in-now-for-your-time-appointment: Check in now for your {{ time, time }} appointment
did-you-travel-from-your-home-address: Did you travel from your home address?
did-you-travel-in-your-own-vehicle: Did you travel in your own vehicle?
find-out-how-to-check-in-on-the-day-of-y: Find out how to check in on the day of your appointment
go-to-the-accessva-travel-claim-portal-n: Go to the AccessVA travel claim portal now
if-you-have-questions-please-call-us-wer: If you have questions, please call us at 800-698-2411 (TTY: 711). We're here 24/7.
if-you-need-to-submit-receipts-for-other: If you need to submit receipts for other expenses like tolls, meals, or lodging, you can’t file a claim now. But you can file your claim online 24/7 through the Beneficiary Travel Self Service System (BTSSS). Or you can use VA Form 10-3542 to submit a claim by mail, fax, email, or in person.
if-you-traveled-by-bus-train-taxi-or-oth: If you traveled by bus, train, taxi, or other authorized public transportation, you can’t file a claim now. But you can file your claim online 24/7 through the Beneficiary Travel Self Service System (BTSSS). Or you can use VA Form 10-3542 to submit a claim by mail, fax, email, or in person.
if-you-traveled-from-a-different-address: If you traveled from a different address, you can’t file a claim now. But you can file your claim online 24/7 through the Beneficiary Travel Self Service System (BTSSS). Or you can use VA Form 10-3542 to submit a claim by mail, fax, email, or in person.
or-talk-to-a-staff-member-if-youre-at-a-: Or talk to a staff member if you're at a VA facility.
if-you-wait-more-than: If you wait more than 15 minutes, tell a staff member.
you-can-still-check-in-once-you-arrive: You can still check-in with your phone once you arrive at your appointment.
you-may-need-to-wait: You may need to wait about 15 minutes for their call. Thanks for your patience.
your-appointment-at-on-is-cancelled: Your appointment at {{time, time}} on {{day, long}} is cancelled.
would-you-like-to-file-a-travel-reimburs: Would you like to file a travel reimbursement claim now?
you-can-also-file-a-claim-online--help-t: You can also file a claim online 24/7 through the Beneficiary Travel Self Service System (BTSSS). Or you can use VA Form 10-3542 to submit a claim by mail, fax, email, or in person. Be sure to file your claim on time. You must file within <0>30 days</0> of the appointment.
received-reimbursement-claim: And we received your travel claim.
we-couldnt-file-reimbursement: But we couldn't file your travel claim.
check-travel-claim-status: You can check the status of your travel reimbursement claim online 24/7 on the Beneficiary Travel Self Service System (BTSSS). You can access BTSSS through the AccessVA travel claim portal.
travel-claim-submission-error: We're sorry, something went wrong on our end. We can't file a travel reimbursement claim for you now. But you can still file within 30 days of the appointment
travel-pay-cant-file-message: We're sorry. We can't file this type of travel reimbursement claim for you now. But you can still file within <0>30 days</0> of the appointment.
find-out-if-youre-eligible--link: Find out if you're eligible and how to file for travel reimbursement
for-questions-about-your-appointment: <0>For questions about your appointment or if you have a health-related concern,</0> ask a staff member at your VA health facility.
for-questions-about-travel-reimbursement: <0>For questions about travel reimbursement and filing a claim,</0> call your VA health facility's Beneficiary Travel contact.
find-the-travel-contact-for-your-facilit: Find the travel contact for your facility
or-call-our-BTSSS-toll-free-call-center: Or call our BTSSS toll-free call center at <0></0> (<1></1>). We're here Monday through Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. ET.
travel-pay-reimbursement--info-message: VA travel pay reimbursement pays eligible Veterans and caregivers back for mileage and other travel expenses to and from approved health care appointments.
find-out-how-to-file--link: Find out how to file for travel reimbursement
